Tonic which grants the following effects for {var:535190580} minutes:

• Complete activities and defeat combatants for a chance to earn one of the following rewards.

POTENTIAL REWARDS

• Gridskipper

• Vintage Tomb of Elders Weapon

name: Elemental Contestant Entrance
description: Adds a competitive appearance to your transmat effects.

name: Shattered Records Entrance
description: Adds a record-shattering appearance to your transmat effects.

name: Mobile Hunter Armor
description: Improved mobility.

name: Parting Gift
description: Dodging leaves behind an explosive that detonates after a short delay, damaging targets around it.

name: Deprecated Perk
description: This perk has been deprecated and no longer functions.

name: Unflinching Stasis Aim
description: Reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming a Stasis weapon.

name: Loyal Moths
description: Final blows and rapid direct hits with this weapon create a loyal moth. The moth will seek out nearby targets and detonate, damaging and blinding them.

name: Crystalline Transistor
description: Precision final blows with Kinetic weapons create an explosion in the element of your equipped Super.

name: Battle-Hearth
description: Gain Super energy for kills and assists inside Well of Radiance.

name: Heavy Ammo Finder
description: Increases the drop chance of Heavy ammo upon defeat of an opponent.

name: Trace Rifle Loader
description: Increases reload speed of Trace Rifles.

name: Lightweight Frame
description: Move faster with this weapon.

name: THE END DRAWS NEAR
description: The air buzzes with anticipation. You feel an itch in your mind as the Witness bends the Light to its will, reshaping reality. Soon its power will be beyond your reckoning. It must be stopped.

name: Creeping Attrition
description: Rapid precision hits slow targets.

name: Font of Might
description: Picking up an Orb of Power grants a temporary strong bonus to weapon damage of the same elemental type as your subclass.

name: Deprecated Perk
description: This perk has been deprecated and no longer functions.

name: Concussive Dampener
description: Reduces incoming area-of-effect damage from combatants.

name: Reaping Wellmaker
description: After activating your class ability, your next weapon final blow on a combatant spawns a Void elemental well.

name: Overload Auto Rifle
description:
Landing sustained hits on combatants with any Auto Rifle you are wielding disrupts combatants, stunning them, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions. 

After any member of your fireteam stuns a Champion, your Auto Rifles gain a temporary bonus to damage against Champions.

name: Echo of Expulsion
description: Void ability final blows cause targets to explode.

name: Arc Staff
description: Form a staff of pure Arc energy and acrobatically take out your foes.

name: MIDA Synergy
description: Lightweight. Increased speed when paired with MIDA Multi-Tool.

name: Aggressive Frame
description: Increases rate of fire after kill.

name: Linear Actuators
description: Faster sprinting and chain melee damage.

name: Jump Jets
description: Buffs maneuverability and air hipfire in Lift.

name: Mecha Holster
description: Reloads stowed SMGs and allows instant ready.

name: Reaper +2
description: Equip multiple pieces from this set to unlock Gambit Prime set perks.

name: Reaper +1
description: Equip multiple pieces from this set to unlock Gambit Prime set perks.

name: Reaper +3
description: Equip multiple pieces from this set to unlock Gambit Prime set perks.

name: Deprecated Perk
description: This perk has been deprecated and no longer functions.

name: Traveler's Valor
description: Upon interaction with a Traveler's Flower, gain a temporary buff that provides increased melee ability regeneration.

name: Traveler's Grace
description: Upon interaction with a Traveler's Flower, gain a temporary buff that randomly provides the effects of one of the other Pale Blessing mods.

name: Traveler's Remedy
description: Upon interaction with a Traveler's Flower, gain a temporary buff that provides increased health regeneration.

name: Traveler's Resurgence
description: Upon interaction with a Traveler's Flower, gain a temporary buff that provides increased grenade ability regeneration.

name: Traveler's Facet
description: Upon interaction with a Traveler's Flower, gain a temporary buff that provides increased class ability regeneration.

name: Traveler's Aegis
description: Upon interaction with a Traveler's Flower, gain a temporary buff that provides a regenerating overshield.

name: Traveler's Insight
description: Upon interaction with a Traveler's Flower, gain a temporary buff that provides increased Super ability regeneration.

name: Cascade Point
description: Final blows or sustained precision hits with another weapon increase this weapon's rate of fire for an improved duration.

name: Deprecated Perk
description: This perk has been deprecated and no longer functions.

name: Unflinching Fusion Rifle Aim
description: Reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming Fusion Rifles.

name: Arc Alignment
description: Dealing Arc damage from any source aligns the battery's coils. When alignment is complete, [Alternate Weapon Action]  to disengage the safety and enable hip-fired Starlight Beam to apply Jolt to any targets damaged for a short time.  Aim down sights to slow the rate at which the battery drains.

name: Rifle Reserves
description: Increases the amount of ammo you can carry for any rifle-class weapon.

name: Synapse Junctions
description: Chained Arc Staff hits buff damage and duration.

name: Probability Matrix
description: Improves Arcbolt Grenades.

name: Wraithmetal Mail
description: Dodge reloads guns and buffs speed and handling.

name: Io Resource Detector
description: Detect resources within a 30-meter range while on Io.

name: Mulligan
description: Missing a shot has an improved chance to return ammo directly to the magazine.

name: Legacy PR-55 Frame
description: Customized frame with dramatically increased accuracy, stability, and targeting while hip firing.

name: Field-Tested
description:
Defeating targets or dealing damage with this weapon gradually increases range, stability, handling, and reload speed.

Swords gain increased charge rate and guard resistance.

name: Ambush
description: Improves range, handling, and damage against combatants during the opening moments of an engagement.

name: Confidence
description: Grants bonus rewards from Flawless Chest.

name: Under Pressure
description: Greatly improved stability and accuracy as the magazine gets lower.

name: Hungering Quarrel
description: Double fires tracking bolts that leech health.

name: The Fate of All Fools
description: Chain precision shots to increase body shot damage.

name: Armsbearer Chant
description: When you use a finisher on an Elite, you generate Special ammo for your fireteam; when you use a finisher on a boss or miniboss, you generate Heavy ammo for your fireteam. Nearby Aeon Cult allies who do not have the Sect of Insight role equipped also gain a burst of Super energy.

name: Aeon's Inspiration
description: Successive precision weapon takedowns have a chance to drop an Orb of Power for your allies.

name: Umbral Harbinger
description: Adds a cauldron of bats appearance to your transmat effects.

name: Luminous Cocoon
description: Adds a webbed escape appearance to your transmat effects.

name: Prime Attunement
description: Chance to receive a powerful Prime Engram by defeating challenging enemies or completing Crucible matches.

name: Unflinching Machine Gun
description: Reduces hit flinch from incoming fire while aiming Machine Guns.

name: Cherry Blossom Entrance
description: Adds a cherry blossom petal appearance to your transmat effects.

name: Cyber Class Entrance
description: Adds bright neon class logo to your transmat effects.

name: The Lost Voice
description: Healing grenades spawn a Restorative Turret.

name: Large Tonic of Glimmering
description:
Tonic which grants the following effects for {var:535190580} minutes:

• Complete activities and defeat combatants for a chance to earn one of the following rewards.

POTENTIAL REWARDS

• Glimmer

name: Supercharged
description: You can have 2 additional stacks of Charged with Light, up to a maximum of 5.

name: Pace Yourself
description: Tapping the trigger gives this weapon less recoil and improves accuracy.

name: The Wanderer
description:
Tangles you throw attach to targets and detonate into a suspending burst. Destroying a Tangle creates a suspending burst after a short delay.

Threadling final blows create a Tangle.

name: Orbs of Restoration
description: Picking up an Orb of Power grants a small amount of energy to your ability with the least energy.

name: Precision Charge
description: Become Charged with Light by rapidly defeating combatants with precision kills from Bows, Hand Cannons, and Scout Rifles.

name: Keep Away

description:
While you're on the Leviathan, your Solar abilities deal 25% more damage.

This mod's abilities cannot stack across multiple copies.

name: Trace Rifle Targeting
description: Improved target acquisition, accuracy, and aim-down-sights speed for Trace Rifles.

description: Collecting or destroying a Warmind Cell creates a concussive blast that pushes enemies away.

name: Bow Reloader
description: Increases reload speed of Bows.

name: Nightmare Crusher
description: Grants additional damage to your melee and grenade abilities against Nightmare Hunt bosses. This benefit does not stack with other mods that provide the same or greater benefit.

name: Nightmare Banisher
description: Grants additional damage to your Super against Nightmare Hunt bosses. This benefit does not stack with other mods that provide the same or greater benefit.

name: Dreambane Mod
description: Reduces the damage you take from Nightmare Hunt bosses. Multiple copies of this mod stack for greater effect.

name: Nightmare Breaker
description: Grants additional damage against shields created by Nightmare Hunt bosses. This benefit does not stack with other mods that provide the same or greater benefit.

name: Synergy
description: Final blows with this weapon have a chance to create an elemental pickup matching its damage type, or an Orb of Power for weapons that deal Kinetic damage.

name: Overload Bow
description: Damage by fully drawn arrows disrupts combatants, stunning them, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions.

name: Unflinching Void Aim

name: Sleight of Hand

name: Hand Cannon Holster
description: Gradually reloads your stowed Hand Cannons over time. Multiple copies of this perk stack to reduce the time taken to fully reload.

name: Melee Momentum

name: Timed Payload
description: Projectiles attached to enemies explode after a short delay.

name: Deprecated Perk

name: Improved Moon Cache Detector

name: Subsistence
description: Defeating targets partially reloads the magazine from reserves with an increased amount of ammo.

name: Double XP: Artifact
description: Artifact progression is currently doubled for a limited time!

name: Exotic Cipher
description: Exotic Cipher

name: Controlled Burst
description: Landing every shot in a burst grants this weapon increased damage and reduced charge time for a short duration.

name: Onslaught: Salvation Weapon

name: High Ground

description: Holding down the trigger will fire this weapon at full auto.

name: Scout Rifles

[Light Attack]  : Throw your hammer at foes.

name: Impulse Amplifier

While in the weave, your melee energy is drained and you generate perched Threadlings over time.

description: While using an Arc subclass, Arc weapon final blows have a chance to spawn an Arc Elemental Orb. Arc Orbs can be thrown to create an Arc explosion that jolts targets it damages.

name: Stunning Recovery
description: Stunning a Champion refills your magazine, triggers health regeneration, and improves recovery for a short duration.

name: Move to Survive
description: Improved Blink

name: Unflinching Kinetic Aim
description: Reduces flinching from incoming fire while aiming a Kinetic weapon.

name: Dynamic Sway Reduction
description: Improves accuracy and stability while continuously holding down the trigger.

name: Stat Increase
description: +10 Strength ▲

name: Large Arms Reserves
description: Increases the amount of ammo you can carry for Rocket Launchers, Grenade Launchers, Machine Guns, and Shotguns.

name: Shotgun Ammo Finder
description: Increases your chance of finding ammo while you have a Shotgun equipped.

name: Knockout
description:
Critically wounding a target or breaking their shield infuses your melee attacks with Arc energy and increases your melee range and damage for a short time.

Defeating targets with melee attacks makes you amplified and restores a portion of your health. Defeating more powerful combatants increases the amount of health restored.

name: Gutshot Straight
description: Aiming down sights increases body shot damage, decreases target acquisition.

name: Controlled Demolition
description: Hitting a target with a Void ability or Volatile explosion makes them volatile. Further damage to a volatile target causes them to explode. Grants you and nearby allies health when volatile targets explode near you.

name: Auto Rifle Loader
description: Increases reload speed of Auto Rifles.

name: Elemental Charge
description: Become Charged with Light by picking up an elemental well. If the elemental well's element type matches your subclass element, you gain 2 stacks of Charged with Light.

name: Rat Pack
description: Fires full auto. Nearby Rat Kings increase strength.

name: Feeding Frenzy
description: Each rapid final blow with this weapon progressively increases reload speed substantially for a short time.

name: Arc Weapon Analyzer
description: Generate Gunsmith telemetry data on Arc weapon kills.

name: Psionic Forging I
description: Increases the duration of the Psychohack Origin Trait and the effect of the Suros Synergy Origin Trait.

name: Psionic Forging II
description: Increases the duration of the Land Tank Origin Trait and the effect of the Häkke Breach Armaments Origin Trait.

name: High Ground
description: Final blows with this weapon grant stacks of bonus damage. Attacking targets from higher ground immediately grants the maximum number of stacks.

name: Valiant Charge
description: Receiving damage while guarding temporarily increases Sword lunge distance for an improved duration.

name: Sniper Damage Resistance
description: Reduces incoming damage from combatants that are at long range.

name: XP Boost
description: Increases experience gains for your Subclass, Weapons, and Armor.

name: Tonic of Gridskipper (Kell's Fall)
description:
Tonic which grants the following effects for {var:535190580} minutes:

• Complete activities and defeat combatants for a chance to earn one of the following rewards.

POTENTIAL REWARDS

• Gridskipper

• Vintage Kell's Fall Weapon

name: Facet of Awakening
description: Rapidly defeating targets with Light or Darkness damage or Super final blows generates an elemental pickup of the matching damage type.

name: Vanguard Scanner
description: Grants a chance to obtain additional faction consumables in Vanguard Operations.

name: Frostpulse
description: Casting your Rift generates a shockwave that freezes nearby combatants.

name: Surprise Attack

name: Tear

Defeating weakened targets with a [Void] Void weapon applies Volatile to nearby targets.

name: Particle Reconstruction

name: Heavy Ordnance Regeneration

name: Elemental Supercharger
description:
Defeating exhausted or severed targets with weapons that match your Super element grants Super energy.

Exhausted targets deal reduced outgoing damage.

name: Recombination
description: Elemental final blows increase the damage of this weapon's next shot.

name: Bow Reserves
description: Increases the amount of Bow ammo you can carry.

name: Bow Dexterity
description: Faster ready and stow speed for Bows.

description: [Light Attack]  : Landing three light-attack hits within an improved short time grants Sword ammo.

name: Sentry +2

name: Sentry +1
description: Equip multiple pieces from this set to unlock Gambit Prime set perks.

name: Sentry +3
description: Equip multiple pieces from this set to unlock Gambit Prime set perks.

name: Strange Signal

name: Bow Reloader
description: Increases the nocking speed of arrows.

name: Empowered Finish

name: Shield Break Charge
description: Become Charged with Light by breaking a combatant shield with the matching energy type.

name: Taking Charge

name: Cold Steel

This weapon collects less ammo. Final blows with this weapon accelerate Light and Darkness mastery.

Transmutation spheres you create can be picked up and wielded as weapons by you or your allies.
• [Light Attack]  : Light attack
• [Heavy Attack]  : Suppressing heavy attack
• [Block]  : Guard/drain nearby targets

Effect lasts until an Upgrade Module is found. Only one Concentrated Mattergem can be active at a time.

Supercharge your fists and slam the ground with the force of a maelstrom. While active:

[Light Attack]  : Quickly charge forward, dealing damage to any impacted targets.

[Heavy Attack] : Slam your fists to the ground, blinding targets and dealing damage in an area around you, leaving aftershocks in your wake. Performing a slam from the air deals additional damage.

[Melee]  : Release a supercharged melee attack that launches additional projectiles.

[Grenade]  : Create a sentient flame wisp that seeks out targets and detonates in a scorching explosion, then seeks out other nearby targets.

While Song of Flame is active, you and nearby allies regenerate abilities more quickly, are more resistant to incoming damage, and your [Solar] Solar and Kinetic weapons scorch targets.

[Light Attack]  : Supercharge your Shiver Strike for bonus damage. Sprint through [Stasis] Stasis crystals or frozen targets to shatter them instantly.

ASPECT OF INTERFERENCE
Purchase this Stasis Aspect from the Exo Stranger on Europa after completing the Beyond Light campaign.

Weapons and abilities empower each other. Defeating combatants with abilities grants increased weapon damage. Defeating combatants with weapons grants increased ability recharge speed.

Empowerment stacks 3 times.

While at maximum empowerment, defeat combatants to gain a boost to mobility.

Active only in Guardian Games Rushdown activities. This buff will expire on weekly reset.

name: Flawless Lighthouse Passage
description:
Amazing, Guardian—you have earned a flawless Lighthouse Passage! On a flawless Passage, every match win will grant you a chance to earn Lighthouse chest rewards, including cosmetics!

Continuing to play on this Passage will match you versus other players with similar weekly performance, or you can play with Guardians who have not yet completed their Passages and help them to reach the Lighthouse. You now have access to a new tracker, which shows your longest win streak on a flawless Passage.

name: Opening Shot

description:

This weapon is also overcharged when that modifier is active.

Rapid hits with this weapon grants Blight Rounds, dealing damage over time to targets hit by this weapon. Strong against Overload Champions.

This weapon is also overcharged when that modifier is active.

name: Ward of Dawn

name: Vestigial Alchemy

This weapon gains energy when you pick up Vestiges and allows you to create ammo at the projectile impact point for you and your allies. Special ammo mode unlocks at 50% energy, while Heavy ammo mode unlocks at 100% energy. 

To transform Vestiges into Special ammo, [Alternate Weapon Action]  and cycle through all available firing modes. 

To transform Vestiges into Heavy ammo, [Alternate Weapon Action]  and cycle firing modes a second time.

name: Rampage

When the dagger hits a surface or a target, you blink to its location and perform a powerful whirling strike, damaging any nearby targets. Can be reactivated after the strike to perform additional throws.

If the dagger flies for long enough without impacting anything, it detonates and you blink to the detonation location.

[Light Attack]  : Attack.
[Block]  : Block.
[Grenade]  : Perform a Shield Throw.

Guard with Sentinel Shield to create a defensive wall that draws hostile fire. Allies who shoot through the wall have increased weapon damage, and guarding allies makes the shield last longer.

[Light Attack]  : Slash forward with your axe, dealing damage and weakening targets.
[Heavy Attack]  : Throw the axe, consuming all remaining ammo.
